text.__SUMMARY__: Ixora nigricans, or black ixora, is a plant growing up to a height of 5 metres. It is found as common undergrowth in evergreen forests to dry evergreen forests up to 1900 m. Black Ixora is found in throughout the forests of the Western Ghats of India .
